search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for mallabe Images (mallabe.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Mallabe Images is [https://www.mallabe.com/pricing](https://www.mallabe.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing
===============  

[![Image 1](https://assets.ycodeapp.com/assets/app17961/Images/0JxKRiwbSMIYGdQ2jaX6T2j6TaKeSfeieM8rWmXC-published.png)](https://www.mallabe.com/)

Features

[CurrenciesConvert & get rates for more than 200 currencies, do that with automations to enrich your business.](https://www.mallabe.com/features/currencies)[ImagesResize & compress your images to save space or extract metadata for later analyze.](https://www.mallabe.com/features/images)[WebsitesCapture & generate websites thumbnails, get their icon & status for business analysis and more..](https://www.mallabe.com/features/websites)[BarcodesGenerate and scan QR, UPC, and EAN barcodes for events and custom use cases.](https://www.mallabe.com/features/barcodes)[ValidationsValidate user input and automate flows such as lead generation.](https://www.mallabe.com/features/validations)

[Pricing](https://www.mallabe.com/pricing)

Marketplaces

[Zapier ![Image 2: zapier](https://assets.ycodeapp.com/assets/app17961/Images/37derrTtrpyWTKWt8wsXOkhbqFV9hjylt1Eo2Dz4-published.png)Zapier connects your tools to streamline your mission-critical processes.](https://www.mallabe.com/marketplaces/zapier)[Make ![Image 3: make-integromat](https://assets.ycodeapp.com/assets/app17961/Images/3tK74UvQWirLvHpHi0EoTqB085nGnkhmFT7mIQBj-published.png)Build and automate anything in one powerful visual platform.](https://www.mallabe.com/marketplaces/make)[Make ![Image 4: make-integromat](https://assets.ycodeapp.com/assets/app17961/Icons/iLegitJK2PUiYBJX7FzcM7E3ghv1T9Qk38M6My6A.svg)Use n8n powerful open-source workflow automation platform with Mallabe.](https://www.mallabe.com/marketplaces/n8n)

[Learn](https://mallabe.notion.site/1eff186e72b24e1a965cc795cf4fffa8) [Blog](https://blog.mallabe.com/)

[Go to Platform ![Image 5](https://assets.ycodeapp.com/assets/app17961/Images/QxN0iegyfsgClbfyoBTgqIrgs9smkiy24WrRXxqJ-published.png)](https://app.mallabe.com/) [Sign up](https://app.mallabe.com/accounts/register)
